hypothesis_content.title: Gas Fee Mean Reversion as ETH Volatility Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH gas fees drop to extreme lows (30-day percentile < 10%) during NEUTRAL regimes, ETH price volatility will increase by 40%+ over the next 7 days as suppressed trading activity resumes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extremely low gas fees indicate network underutilization and potential market complacency. Historically, such periods precede volatility expansions as pent-up trading demand emerges or catalysts trigger renewed activity.
entry_conditions: No major ETH upgrades/scheduled events in next 7 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH 7-day realized volatility increases to > 1.6x entry level
exit_conditions.stop_loss: ETH 7-day realized volatility remains below 1.2x entry level after 7 days

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Low gas fees persist without corresponding volatility increase, suggesting structural changes in network usage patterns or permanent reduction in base layer activity.
